languages.text: Попытка установить первый контакт с Кьявой Гамма (система Кранах) вызвала враждебную реакцию. Необходимо как можно скорее изучить положение дел на планете и выполнить необходимые шаги для установления контроля Вольного Торговца над индустриальным миром.

An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.
languages.original_text: Попытка установить первый контакт с Кьявой Гамма (система Кранах) вызвала враждебную реакцию. Необходимо как можно скорее изучить положение дел на планете и выполнить необходимые шаги для установления контроля Вольного Торговца над индустриальным миром.

traits.locale_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach system provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach system provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

languages.text: 行商浪人试图与克兰纳克星系的基亚瓦伽马星进行接触，但初次接触便激起了该行星的敌对反应。领主舰长必须弄清那颗行星发生了什么事情，采取必要措施，重新恢复对这个工业世界的控制。
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人试图与克兰纳克星系的基亚瓦伽马星进行接触，但初次接触便激起了该行星的敌对反应。领主舰长必须弄清那颗行星发生了什么事情，采取必要措施，重新恢复对这个工业世界的控制。

languages.text: クラナッハ星系でキアヴァ・ガンマとのファーストコンタクトを確立しようとする試みは、敵対的反応を引き起こした。ロード・キャプテンは惑星の状況を見直し、産業惑星に対する自由開拓者の支配を再度強化するために必要な措置を講じなければならない。
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: クラナッハ星系でキアヴァ・ガンマとのファーストコンタクトを確立しようとする試みは、敵対的反応を引き起こした。ロード・キャプテンは惑星の状況を見直し、産業惑星に対する自由開拓者の支配を再度強化するために必要な措置を講じなければならない。

languages.text: El intento de establecer primer contacto con Kiava Gamma, en el sistema Cranach, ha provocado una reacción hostil. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe analizar la situación del planeta y tomar las medidas necesarias para volver a imponer el control de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el mundo industrial.
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: El intento de establecer primer contacto con Kiava Gamma, en el sistema Cranach, ha provocado una reacción hostil. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe analizar la situación del planeta y tomar las medidas necesarias para volver a imponer el control de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el mundo industrial.

languages.text: Der Versuch, einen Erstkontakt mit Kiava Gamma im Cranach-System herzustellen, hat eine feindselige Reaktion ausgelöst. Der Lord Captain muss die Lage auf dem Planeten sondieren und die nötigen Schritte ergreifen, um die Produktionswelt wieder unter Kontrolle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu bringen.
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: Der Versuch, einen Erstkontakt mit Kiava Gamma im Cranach-System herzustellen, hat eine feindselige Reaktion ausgelöst. Der Lord Captain muss die Lage auf dem Planeten sondieren und die nötigen Schritte ergreifen, um die Produktionswelt wieder unter Kontrolle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu bringen.

languages.text: La tentative visant à établir un premier contact avec Kiava Gamma dans le système de Cranach a déclenché une réaction hostile. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit évaluer la situation sur la planète et prendre les mesures nécessaires pour réaffirmer l'autorité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur le monde industriel.
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: La tentative visant à établir un premier contact avec Kiava Gamma dans le système de Cranach a déclenché une réaction hostile. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit évaluer la situation sur la planète et prendre les mesures nécessaires pour réaffirmer l'autorité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur le monde industriel.

languages.text: Cranach Sistemi'ndeki Kiava Gama'yla ilk teması gerçekleştirme girişimi, saldırgan bir tepkiyi tetikledi. Lord Kaptan'ın, gezegendeki durumu tahlil edip sınai dünyanın yeniden Hür Tacir'in kontrolüne geçmesi için gerekli adımları atması gerek.
languages.original_text: An attempt to establish first contact with Kiava Gamma in the Cranach System provoked a hostile reaction. The Lord Captain must review the situation on the planet and take necessary steps to reassert the Rogue Trader's control over the industrial world.

traits.locale_text: Cranach sistemindeki Kiava Gama'yla ilk teması gerçekleştirme girişimi, saldırgan bir tepkiyi tetikledi. Lord Kaptan gezegendeki durumu analiz etmeli ve endüstri dünyasının yeniden Hür Tacir'in kontrolüne geçmesi için gerekli adımları atmalı.
